blogPost.excerpt: ReWrap your Spotify Wrapped to discover artists you’ve never heard of based on the sound of songs you already listen to. Powered by the Andrson algorithm, trained on over 200 hours of music.
blogPost.body: ReWrap your Spotify Wrapped to discover artists you’ve never heard of based on the sound of songs you already listen to. Powered by the Andrson algorithm, trained on over 200 hours of music.
blogPost.title: ReWrapped - Sound-driven music discovery
blogPost.author: Sarah McBride

localize.description: 重新包装你的Spotify Wrapped，根据你已经听过的歌曲的声音来发现你从未听过的艺术家。由Andrson算法提供支持，对200多个小时的音乐进行训练。
重新包裝你的Spotify Wrapped，根據你已經聽過的歌曲的聲音來發現你從未聽過的藝術家。由Andrson算法提供支持，對200多個小時的音樂進行訓練。

previous.excerpt: They are perfect to be used in email to redirect iOS users to the app store, android users to the play store and for those that uses a computer, you can redirect them to your web app. And those users we can not match, they will be sent do your default url.

localize.description: 他们是完美的被用于在电子邮件中重定向iOS用户到应用商店，安卓用户到Play商店和那些使用电脑，你可以重定向他们到你的Web应用程序。而那些我们无法匹配的用户，他们将被发送到做你的默认网址。
localize.tagline: 创建动态链接，根据设备或操作系统重定向。

localize.description: 他們是完美的被用於在電子郵件中重定向iOS用戶到應用商店，安卓用戶到Play商店和那些使用電腦，你可以重定向他們到你的Web應用程序。而那些我們無法匹配的用戶，他們將被髮送到做你的默認網址。
localize.tagline: 創建動態鏈接，根據設備或操作系統重定向。
